title: Text on sites becomes becomes garbled up
content: Good Day, The text on the screen becomes garbled up many times in a day. Whereas other Applications programs e.g. Outlook, PDF Reader, MS teams etc. have no issues with the display. In addition, Firefox has started crashing number of times in a day.

title: secure connection failed error
content:
Writing this on my Mac since my wife's Windows 10 machine's Firefox is no longer able to access the Internet except for two bookmarks. All the rest of her bookmarks give this error, and typing anything into the Firefox browser also gives us the error. We do have Internet connection because she is getting her emails. But. trying alternative browser Microsoft Edge gives the same error. I have tried cleaning out the cookies and cache, have tried the about.config to change the security ssl enable to false - no help there. I did change it back immediately. I've also rebooted completely several times.

Can't understand why the two bookmarks can access online when the rest don't. This is a real handicap as she has a number of functions that require her computer.

Please help!
creator: footydad55

title: Firefox 93.0 update - Secure Connection Failed
content:
After updating to Firefox 93.0 , I'm getting this error constantly when trying to access my Ubiquiti wireless equipment:


Secure Connection Failed

An error occurred during a connection to 10.1.0.1:8xxx. Certificate key usage inadequate for attempted operation.

Error code: SEC_ERROR_INADEQUATE_KEY_USAGE 

   The page you are trying to view cannot be shown because the authenticity of the received data could not be verified.    Please contact the website owners to inform them of this problem.'


Everything worked fine before update, and still works fine on Chrome etc.

I've tried turning off all security settings (I think), but nothing seems to help.

I understand some security changes were included in this update. How do I reverse them, or even better downgrade, without losing all my windows, tabs etc (I run 3 windows and 100's a tabs 24/7, not keen to lose progress, or have to start using a new browser).

Thank you in advance.
creator: craigrjones78
